meanings.definition: The act or process of towing a vessel or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The towage of the boat was done carefully to avoid any damage.
meanings.sent2: The towage of the car to the repair shop was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent3: The towage of the tiny toy boat in the bathtub made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: The towage of ideas from one project to another can lead to creative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The towage of the massive ship through the narrow canal was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The fee or charge for towing a vessel or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The towage for rescuing the stranded boat was quite expensive.
meanings.sent2: The towage for moving the truck to the impound lot had to be paid upfront.
meanings.sent3: The towage fee for the lost bicycle was surprisingly high.
meanings.sent4: The towage cost for the yacht was a small price to pay for safety.
meanings.sent5: The towage charge for the helicopter was worth every penny for the swift service provided.
